name: Apajove
description: Apajove is an experienced IT solutions provider for Microsoft products. As a Triple Gold Certified Microsoft Partner, we help businesses with design, implementation and support across a wide-range of Microsoft products, to deliver rapid results and outstanding return on investment. We are also the creators of Callisto, the breakthrough dashboard for Microsoft System Center. This interactive, all-in-one platform enables businesses to harness the powerful potential of System Center data.
